entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
